snippet: In publicly affirming his support for marriage equality, the president took the moral high ground on what may be the civil rights struggle of our time.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's decisive endorsement of marriage equality, ending his long 'evolution' on issue; expresses hope that Obama, when the time comes, will support a Supreme Court decision ruling that state prohibitions against gay marriage are unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: In publicly affirming his support for marriage equality, the president took the moral high ground on what may be the civil rights struggle of our time.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
